an10.153:1.1: “I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to recollect. …
an10.153:1.3: And what is the principle not to recollect?
an10.153:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.153:1.5: This is called the principle not to recollect.
an10.153:1.6: And what is the principle to recollect?
an10.153:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.153:1.8: This is called the principle to recollect.”
